contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Cranendonck | image_skyline = Budel - Markt 1 Voormalig schepenhuis.JPG | image_flag = Flag of Cranendonck.jpg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = Flag of Cranendonck | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Cranendonck.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Cranendonck |image_map = LocatieCranendonck.png |mapsize = 250px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[North Brabant]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 78.14 |area_land_km2 = 76.79 |area_water_km2 = 1.34 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 20270 |population_density_km2 = 264 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd=51|latm=18|lats=|latNS=N |longd=05|longm=36|longs=|longEW=E }} '''Cranendonck''' ({{pronunciation|183 Cranendonck.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] in the southern [[Netherlands]]. == Population centres == * [[Budel]] * [[Budel-Dorplein]] * [[Budel-Schoot]] * [[Gastel]] * [[Maarheeze]] * [[Soerendonk]] ==External links== *{{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.cranendonck.nl Official website] {{Geographic location | Centre = Cranendonck | North = [[Heeze-Leende]] | Northeast = [[Someren]] | East = [[Nederweert]] ([[Limburg (Netherlands)|LI]])<br>[[Weert]] ([[Limburg (Netherlands)|LI]]) | South = [[Bocholt, Belgium|Bocholt]] ([[Belgium|BE]]-[[Limburg (Belgium)|VLI]]), [[Weert]] ([[Limburg (Netherlands)|LI]]) | West = [[Hamont-Achel]] ([[Belgium|BE]]-[[Limburg (Belgium)|VLI]]) }} {{North Brabant Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of North Brabant]] {{NorthBrabant-geo-stub}}
